No results.
import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {DataService} from "../../services/data.service"; @Component({ selector: 'blog', templateUrl: './blog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./blog.component.css'] }) export class BlogComponent implements OnInit { public items$: any; @Input() filterText?: string; constructor(private service: DataService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getAll(); } getAll() { this.service.getAll().subscribe(response => { this.items$ = response; }); } }
